skins.shipDescription: Bogue-class escort carrier ¡ª Bogue, Hull Number CVE-9!
skins.selfIntroduction: I am pro baseballer, Bogue! Yep, my greatest record is 12 strikeouts in a single match! I wish to sharpen my skills by your side, and become the shining star of the Major League!
skins.acquisition: *inhale*...HAA! Nice one... Oh, apologies. You're the Commander, I see. Fast pitcher, Bogue, here for duty!
skins.login: The best pitchers are always training. Yep!
skins.details: Please keep my stats in mind!
skins.secretaryIdle1: With this ball, I can sink a submarine!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, can you polish the B-25s?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Boring... You look tired anyway, Commander, so let's go and sink some subs?
skins.secretaryTouch: What's this? Training to resist against attacks?

skins.shipDescription: Commander, there's no need to be so afraid. There are only two things my balls hit-- Enemies, and victory! Ah, sometimes they do hit the windows too, ahaha...
skins.acquisition: Commander, there's no need to be so afraid. There are only two things my balls hit-- Enemies, and victory! Ah, sometimes they do hit the windows too, ahaha...
skins.secretaryIdle1: My goal is the Major Le... I mean, submarine fighting, a three strike finish!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Rest assured, Commander! While I'm doing escort duty, no ships sink under my watch!
skins.secretaryIdle3: I am here today because of Yorkie and Lady Lex. I have to give them my thanks!
skins.secretaryTouch: Yes! Thanks for getting my ball!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Haha, I'm used to this type of interference now!
